mapper.delete: delete from follow where activeUser =#{activeUser} and passiveUser=#{passiveUser}
mapper.select: select count(*) from follow where activeUser=#{activeUser} and passiveUser=#{passiveUser}

select activeUser,passiveUser, F.regDate as regDate, M.id as passiveUserId, I.profileName as profileName from Follow F left outer join Member M on (F.passiveUser = M.memberNo) left outer join UserImgs I on (I.userNo = M.memberNo) where activeUser = #{activeUser} order by regDate desc;

select activeUser,passiveUser, F.regDate as regDate, M.id as activeUserId, I.profileName as profileName from Follow F left outer join Member M on (F.activeUser = M.memberNo) left outer join UserImgs I on (I.userNo = M.memberNo) where passiveUser = #{passiveUser} order by regDate desc;
